column1: #Text=# Tree in Tree: from Decision Trees to Decision Graphs
#Text=This repository is the implementation of [Tree in Tree: from Decision Trees to Decision Graphs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2110.00392).
#Text=Visualization examples of the fitted TnT graph structures:
#Text=\\# S indicates the number of split nodes, which is an estimate of model complexity
#Text=If you use this code for research, please consider citing our paper:
#Text=      title={Tree in Tree: from Decision Trees to Decision Graphs},
